properties.body:
EASTERN CARIBBEAN SEA.
SAINT MARTIN TO SAINT LUCIA.
DNC 14, DNC 16.
38 FOOT S/V JULIA, WHITE HULL WITH BLUE STRIPE,
TWO PERSONS ON BOARD, OVERDUE MARIGOT
(18-04N 063-05W) TO CASTRIES (14-01N 060-59W).
VESSELS IN VICINITY REQUESTED TO KEEP A SHARP
LOOKOUT, ASSIST IF POSSIBLE.
REPORTS TO MRCC FORT DE FRANCE,
INMARSAT-C: 422799024,
TELEX: 42912008,
PHONE: 5965 9670 9292,
FAX: 5965 9663 2450,
E-MAIL: ANTILLES@MRCCFR.EU.
